appendix.para: This appendix is a unified change log for all of the NineML components in this repository. It’s never formatted directly, it’s distributed into the different component repositories during the build. Having the source in a single place is an attempt to simplify managing the change log. The log is used automatically in the release notes for each component.
The unified log starts at version 3.0.0m. Previous history is in the individual component changelogs.xml files.

revdescription.para: This is a beta release for version 3.0.0.

listitem.para: Fixed a bug where the GLL parser would fail to correctly find the parser attributes associated with a “left hand side”.
Fixed a bug in the ambiguity analyzer where it didn’t support Unicode character class groupings (LC, L, M, N, P, S, Z, C).
Added an option to normalize line endings.

Added an option to mark ambiguities. When enabled, this option identifies places in the tree where an ambiguous choice was made. (This only works for vertical ambiguities on nonterminals that aren’t suppressed.)

revdescription.para: Added support for the “mark ambiguities” option. When enabled n:ambiguous="true" attributes are added to the XML trees.

listitem.para: Fixed a serialization bug where a newline was sometimes missing before a closing tag when pretty printing was enabled.
Fixed a serialization bug where the “trailing newline on output” option was ignored.
Added a --normalize option and a normalize-line-endings property to enable normalizing line endings on the input.
Added a --mark-ambiguities option and a mark-ambiguities property to support marking the location of ambiguities in the XML trees.
Added a --provenance option and a provenance property to support writing provenance (program version, input, grammar details) as a comment at the top of XML outputs.
Moved the ambiguity report output from “standard output” to “standard error” so that command line redirection once again only includes the XML. Added a --debug option.
